quote: It is indeed a radical act of love just to sit down and be quiet for a time by yourself. – Jon Kabat-Zinn
fact: Ants closely resemble human manners:  When they wake, they stretch & appear to yawn in a human manner before taking up the tasks of the day.
joke: I saw a documentary on TV last night about how they put ships together.  It was rivetting.
